Reference

Prepare simulations

generate_climate()

Generate climate dataset

generate_parameters()

Generate parameters

update_parameters()

Function to update parameters from a TROLL outputs for a next simulation.

get_forest()

Function to get a forest inventory from TROLL outputs.

Run simulations

troll()

troll

stack()

Stack

Analyze simulations

load_output()

Function to load outputs from a TROLL simulation.

load_stack()

Function to load a stack of outputs from TROLL simulations.

print(<trollsim>) show(<trollsim>)

Function to print or show TROLL outputs.

summary(<trollsim>)

Function to a summary of TROLL outputs.

autoplot(<trollsim>)

Plot TROLL simulation or stack

autogif()

Make a gif from a TROLL simulation

Data

TROLLv3_climatedaytime12

TROLL climate parameters over months

TROLLv3_daytimevar

TROLL daytime variation parameters

TROLLv3_input

TROLL global parameters

TROLLv3_output

TROLL output

TROLLv3_species

TROLL species parameters

rcontroll

rcontroll

TROLL.version()

Function to print TROLL version.

trollsim()

An S4 class to represent TROLL simulations

trollstack()

An S4 class to represent TROLL stack

trollsim-class

An S4 class to represent TROLL simulations

trollstack-class

An S4 class to represent TROLL stack

TROLL simulator
